languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на Кьяве Гамма обнаружена странная аномалия. В производственные алгоритмы внедрилась некая цепь приказов, определяемая как Процедура 0-Х. Слуги Омниссии определяют ее статус исполнения как "наисвятейший", а потому безукоризненно следуют ее предписаниям. За один цикл во всех мануфакторумах были воздвигнуты камеры, связанные вычислительными каналами когитаторов. Они складываются в узор, подобный тем, что наносятся на цифровые кельи духов машины".

"Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-C, has forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its execution status as 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions to the letter. In just one cycle, cells were erected in all the manufactorums, connected by cogitators, or more precisely, their computing channels. This network forms a pattern similar to those applied to the digital cells of machine spirits."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на Кьяве Гамма обнаружена странная аномалия. В производственные алгоритмы внедрилась некая цепь приказов, определяемая как Процедура 0-Х. Слуги Омниссии определяют ее статус исполнения как "наисвятейший", а потому безукоризненно следуют ее предписаниям. За один цикл во всех мануфакторумах были воздвигнуты камеры, связанные вычислительными каналами когитаторов. Они складываются в узор, подобный тем, что наносятся на цифровые кельи духов машины".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-X, had-forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its performing status as the 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions impeccably. In one cycle, the cameras connected by the computing channels of the Cogitators-have been erected in all of the manufactories. They make a pattern similar to that applied to the digital cells of the machine spirits."

"Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-X, had-forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its performing status as the 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions impeccably. In one cycle, the cameras connected by the computing channels of the Cogitators-have been erected in all of the manufactories. They make a pattern similar to that applied to the digital cells of the machine spirits."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们在基亚瓦伽马星上发现了古怪的异常现象。我们发现了一系列指令，命名为‘0-C程序’，正在强行进入制造算法。欧姆尼塞亚的仆人将这个程序的执行状态定为‘至圣’，并以无可指摘的准确执行着它的指示。仅仅在一个周期之内，所有的制造工厂都安装了算法单元，通过沉思者连结。或者更确切地说，是通过它们的算法通道进行连接。沉思者网络之中形成了特定的模式，与机魂数字单元的模式颇为类似。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-C, has forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its execution status as 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions to the letter. In just one cycle, cells were erected in all the manufactorums, connected by cogitators, or more precisely, their computing channels. This network forms a pattern similar to those applied to the digital cells of machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们在基亚瓦伽马星上发现了古怪的异常现象。我们发现了一系列指令，命名为‘0-C程序’，正在强行进入制造算法。欧姆尼塞亚的仆人将这个程序的执行状态定为‘至圣’，并以无可指摘的准确执行着它的指示。仅仅在一个周期之内，所有的制造工厂都安装了算法单元，通过沉思者连结。或者更确切地说，是通过它们的算法通道进行连接。沉思者网络之中形成了特定的模式，与机魂数字单元的模式颇为类似。”
“舰长大人，我们在基亚瓦伽马星上发现了古怪的异常现象。我们发现了一系列指令，命名为‘0-C程序’，正在强行进入制造算法。欧姆尼塞亚仆人将这个程序的执行状态定为‘至圣’，并以无可挑剔的准确执行着它的指示。仅仅在一个周期之内，所有的制造工厂都安装了算法单元，通过沉思者连结。或者更确切地说，是通过它们的算法通道进行连接。沉思者网络之中形成了特定的模式，与机魂数字单元的模式颇为类似。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, se ha detectado una extraña anomalía en Kiava Gamma. Una serie de órdenes, definidas como Procedimiento 0-C, se han introducido a la fuerza en los algoritmos de producción. Los sirvientes del Omnissiah definen su estado de ejecución como "extremadamente sagrado" y, por tanto, siguen sus instrucciones al pie de la letra. En un solo ciclo, se han instalado celdas en todos los manufactorums, conectadas mediante cogitadores; específicamente mediante sus canales computacionales. La red forma un patrón similar al de las celdas digitales de los espíritus máquina».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-C, has forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its execution status as 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions to the letter. In just one cycle, cells were erected in all the manufactorums, connected by cogitators, or more precisely, their computing channels. This network forms a pattern similar to those applied to the digital cells of machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, se ha detectado una extraña anomalía en Kiava Gamma. Una serie de órdenes, definidas como Procedimiento 0-C, se han introducido a la fuerza en los algoritmos de producción. Los sirvientes del Omnissiah definen su estado de ejecución como "extremadamente sagrado" y, por tanto, siguen sus instrucciones al pie de la letra. En un solo ciclo, se han instalado celdas en todos los manufactorums, conectadas mediante cogitadores; específicamente mediante sus canales computacionales. La red forma un patrón similar al de las celdas digitales de los espíritus máquina».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、キアヴァ・ガンマで奇妙なアノマリーが検知されました。プロシージャー0-Cと定義される一連の命令が、生産アルゴリズムに強制的に組み込まれていました。万機神に仕える者たちは、それを実行することを'最も神聖な作業'と定義し、その指示に完璧に従っています。わずか1サイクルで、すべての聖工場にカメラが設置され、考算機の計算チャンネルで接続されました。それらは、機械精霊のデジタル・セルに適用されるものと同様のパターンを作っています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-C, has forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its execution status as 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions to the letter. In just one cycle, cells were erected in all the manufactorums, connected by cogitators, or more precisely, their computing channels. This network forms a pattern similar to those applied to the digital cells of machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、キアヴァ・ガンマで奇妙なアノマリーが検知されました。プロシージャー0-Xと定義される一連の命令が、生産アルゴリズムに強制的に組み込まれていました。万機神に仕える者たちは、それを実行することを'最も神聖な作業'と定義し、その指示に完璧に従っています。わずか1サイクルで、すべての聖工場にカメラが設置され、考算機の計算チャンネルで接続されました。それらは、機械精霊のデジタル・セルに適用されるものと同様のパターンを作っています」

「ロード・キャプテン、キアヴァ・ガンマで奇妙なアノマリーが検知されました。プロシージャー0-Cと定義される一連の命令が、生産アルゴリズムに強制的に組み込まれていました。万機神に仕える者たちは、それを実行することを'最も神聖な作業'と定義し、その指示に完璧に従っています。わずか1サイクルで、すべての聖工場にカメラが設置され、考算機の計算チャンネルで接続されました。それらは、機械精霊のデジタル・セルに適用されるものと同様のパターンを作っています」

languages.text: « Seigneur-capitaine, une anomalie a été détectée sur Kiava Gamma. Une série d'ordres, répondant au nom de Procédure 0-C, s'est immiscée dans les algorithmes de production. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie jugent son exécution comme étant "hautement sacrée" et en respectent les instructions à la lettre. En l'espace d'un seul cycle, des cellules ont été installées dans tous les manufactorums et reliées aux cogitateurs, ou plus précisément à leurs canaux de calcul. Ce réseau forme un motif similaire à celui des cellules numériques des esprits de la machine. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-C, has forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its execution status as 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions to the letter. In just one cycle, cells were erected in all the manufactorums, connected by cogitators, or more precisely, their computing channels. This network forms a pattern similar to those applied to the digital cells of machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: « Seigneur-capitaine, une anomalie a été détectée sur Kiava Gamma. Une série d'ordres, répondant au nom de Procédure 0-C, s'est immiscée dans les algorithmes de production. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie jugent son exécution comme étant "hautement sacrée" et en respectent les instructions à la lettre. En l'espace d'un seul cycle, des cellules ont été installées dans tous les manufactorums et reliées aux cogitateurs, ou plus précisément à leurs canaux de calcul. Ce réseau forme un motif similaire à celui des cellules numériques des esprits de la machine. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, auf Kiava Gamma wurde eine merkwürdige Anomalie entdeckt. Eine Reihe von Befehlen, definiert als Prozedur 0-C, hat sich in die Produktionsalgorithmen gezwängt. Die Diener des Omnissiah definieren ihren Ausführungsstatus als 'höchst heilig' und befolgen ihre Anweisungen deshalb akribisch. Innerhalb eines einzige Zyklus wurden in allen Manufactorien Zellen gebaut, die mit Cogitatoren oder genauer mit deren Berechnungskanälen verbunden sind. Dieses Netzwerk bildet ein Muster, das den digitalen Zellen der Maschinengeister ähnelt."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-C, has forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its execution status as 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions to the letter. In just one cycle, cells were erected in all the manufactorums, connected by cogitators, or more precisely, their computing channels. This network forms a pattern similar to those applied to the digital cells of machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, auf Kiava Gamma wurde eine merkwürdige Anomalie entdeckt. Eine Reihe von Befehlen, definiert als Prozedur 0-C, hat sich in die Produktionsalgorithmen gezwängt. Die Diener des Omnissiah definieren ihren Ausführungsstatus als 'höchst heilig' und befolgen ihre Anweisungen deshalb akribisch. Innerhalb eines einzige Zyklus wurden in allen Manufactorien Zellen gebaut, die mit Cogitatoren oder genauer mit deren Berechnungskanälen verbunden sind. Dieses Netzwerk bildet ein Muster, das den digitalen Zellen der Maschinengeister ähnelt."

"Lord Captain, auf Kiava Gamma wurde eine merkwürdige Anomalie entdeckt. Eine Reihe von Befehlen, als Prozedur 0-C definiert, hat sich in die Produktionsalgorithmen gezwängt. Die Diener des Omnissiah definieren ihren Ausführungsstatus als 'höchst heilig' und befolgen ihre Anweisungen daher genau. Innerhalb eines einzige Zyklus wurden in allen Manufactorien Kameras installiert, die mit den Berechnungskanälen der Cogitatoren verbunden sind. Sie bilden Muster ganz ähnlich dem der digitalen Zellen auf den Maschinengeistern."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Kiava Gama'da tuhaf bir anomali tespit edildi. 0-C Sayılı Prosedür olarak tanımlanan bir dizi emir, üretim algoritmalarına sızmış. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, prosedürün işlem durumuna 'hayli mukaddes' diyor. Verdiği yönergeleri tamı tamına izlememiz gerekiyormuş. Bir döngü kadar kısa bir sürede tüm manufaktorumlarda hücreler inşa edilip kavramsayarlara, yani bilgi işlem kanallarına bağlanmış. Bu ağ, makine ruhlarının dijital hücrelerindekine benzer bir model oluşturuyormuş."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a strange anomaly has been detected on Kiava Gamma. A series of orders, defined as Procedure 0-C, has forced itself into the production algorithms. The servants of the Omnissiah define its execution status as 'most sacred' and therefore follow its instructions to the letter. In just one cycle, cells were erected in all the manufactorums, connected by cogitators, or more precisely, their computing channels. This network forms a pattern similar to those applied to the digital cells of machine spirits."
